objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Elegant Crystal Accents
• Perfect Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant banner features a soft, feminine composition split vertically, with the left side in a slightly warmer pink and the right in a cooler pink tone. At the center lies the product image — a pair of rose gold wreath stud earrings with crystals. Featured prominently at the top left is the main headline (`heading`), executed in a bold uppercase serif font, followed by a more delicate subheadline (`subheading`). A short list (`description`) explains product highlights. The price (`price`) sits beneath, accented in the same color as the heading. A solid rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) containing encouraging text (`cta`) stands out. Decorative curves, circles, dotted lines, and minimal graphic shapes add visual charm. A customer rating represented by stars (`rating`) is placed subtly near the bottom right of the text area.

**Color Palette**:  
- Pale Blush Pink (#FFF5F6)  
- Light Rose (#FFEAED)  
- Rosewood (#B95761)  
- Coral Red (#E67E7E)  
- Warm Gold Gradient (#E6C19C to #F8C593 to #E6A27C)  
- Accent Pink (#FFABB3)  
- White (#FFFFFF)  
- Deep Plum (#7A494F)
product_color: The product image features elegant rose-gold circular earrings adorned with clear white gemstones. The primary color is a soft **rose gold (#F6A5A5)**, which enriches the jewelry with a warm, luxurious tone. This is seamlessly blended with **crystal white (#FFFFFF)** and **diamond silver (#D8D8D8)** to highlight the embedded stones. The contrast between the matte pink and shimmering stones creates a balanced and eye-catching aesthetic. Subtle gradients in the metalwork enhance dimension while lighting reflections emphasize clarity and sparkle. For an advertisement banner, a palette of **rose gold (#F6A5A5)**, **crystal white (#FFFFFF)**, **silver gray (#C0C0C0)**, and a soft champagne background (#FDF1E7) is ideal.
